data.title: Bigg Boss 18: List Of Contestants, Premiere Date And Host... All Details About Salman Khan's Show Are Here
data.text:
After the end of Bigg Boss OTT 3, the countdown has begun for the return of TV’s Bigg Boss. Salman Khan could not host Bigg Boss OTT 3 streamed on Jio Cinema. He was busy shooting for his upcoming film Sikandar. In Salman’s absence, the makers turned to Anil Kapoor and he hosted the entire season. But now Salman Khan is returning as the host of Bigg Boss to be telecast on Colors TV. Along with this, the names of many contestants for Bigg Boss season 18 have also come out.

The finale of Bigg Boss OTT 3 was held on 2 August. In which Sana Maqbool won the trophy. This time, apart from Sana, Neji i.e. Naved Sheikh, Ranveer Shourie, Kritika Malik and Sai Ketan Rao reached the top 5. However, everyone was eliminated and Neji and Sana competed for the trophy. But in the end Sana won. Indian Express news has said that Bigg Boss season 18 will start from October 5. That means this time the show will premiere on the first Saturday of October. Although no contestant’s name has been officially announced yet, several contestants have been approached by the makers of the show.

Who will participate in Bigg Boss 18?

On Monday, Payal Malik claimed in his vlog that Armaan Malik’s second wife Kritika Malik is joining season 18. However, there is no official news regarding this. If reports are to be believed, if the makers of Bigg Boss lock someone for the show, they sign an NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement) with them. In such a situation, if someone gives information about joining the show before the show, a penalty is imposed on him.

NDAs may be signed, but most contestants’ names each season already appear in reports. This time also the names of many contestants are being mentioned in the media reports. It includes stars like Arjun Bijlani, Karan Patel, Sameera Reddy, Surbhi Jyoti, Pooja Sharma, Shoaib Malik and Daljit Kaur. Apart from this, the names of many social media influencers are also being discussed, who have been approached for the show. It includes people like Abhishek Malhan, Sri Faisu, Deepika Arya, Dolly Chaiwala, Maxtern and Thagesh aka Mahesh Keshwala.

Bigg Boss OTT 3 contestants in Bigg Boss 18?

It is also being said that this time Splitsvilla’s star contestants Kashish Kapoor, Digvijay Singh Rathi and Sivet Tomar may also appear on Salman Khan’s show. Apart from this, some reports are also saying that the makers are also going to include Adnan Sheikh, Vishal Pandey and Shivani Kumari, who were part of Bigg Boss OTT 3, in the show. However, none of these names have been officially confirmed yet.
